Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have recently started playing ksp again after taking a break around the release of 0.90 beta and haven't stayed up to date with the modding community. I was just wondering, what are the newest, greatest, most amazing looking visual packs out? Are the old KSPRC and AVP3 still the best packs available or are there newer better things?

Thanks
There's not much thats new that's going to be visually more impressive than KSPRC or Interstellar.

Hello. So i would suggest going with EVE, AVP3 and Scatterer. Put the extra features like the aurora and duna sandstorms and stuff like that in the buildco folder, also replace the EVE city lights with the one from astronomers. Here are some pics
